subject: junit reports
msgSnippet: How to get JUnit reports in a word doc? There are html reports produced using the foll:
messageBody:
How to get JUnit reports in a word doc? There are html reports produced
using the foll:
<target name="testresults" description="Produce a web report of the test
results (see unittest )"
depends="unittests">
<junitreport todir="${reports.webpages}">
<fileset dir="${reports.junit}">
<include name="TEST-*.xml"/>
</fileset>
<report format="frames" todir="${reports.webpages}"/>
</junitreport>
<echo>Your test results are in the directoty "${reports.junit}"</echo>
</target>

is there a way to get them as word document reports?

Thanks in advance,

Balraj


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
